overview: The fifth edition of Tomorrowland, in July 2009, was a very sunny and overwhelming success! A festival just like a fairytale, in an unique decor and not less than 90 000 exuberant visitors. The tremendous line up, with the special birthday headliner – Moby, made sure the sphere was overwhelming from the first till the last note. Who doesn’t want a memory of such a fantastic festival? Therefore the Tomorrowland DVD is the perfect souvenir of a sultry summer. The DVD offers you 4 different chapters each exposing another “Tomorrowland’.
tagline: Yesterday is history, today is a gift, tomorrow is mystery
title: Tomorrowland: 2009
